item.description: Authentication Explanation # Glimesh requires a form of authentication to use the API. Every query (or endpoint) must have authentication passed to it to receive your information. This doc explains what methods of authentication exist and how to get them. Glimesh follows the OAuth 2.0 spec which can be found here Methods of Authentication # If you want to use the API you must have a developer application. This is a small document that contains info about your product.
